p: Till the time of writing of this case report, none of the family members had any unusual symptoms, which suggests that they were all fully recovered. The six patients were also positive for anti-SARS CoV-2 IgG antibodies. This result is consistent with a study which demonstrated anti-SARS CoV-2 IgG antibody in serum of convalescent patient that could neutralize the virus activity in a pseudotype entry assay ( 21). Additionally, a recent study showed that SARS-CoV-2 infection induced protective immunity against re-exposure in rhesus macaques ( 22).
